basics.name: Borja Herranz Moral
basics.label: Software Development Engineer in Test
summary: Bachelor's degree in Industrial Technologies Engineering and Master in Industrial Engineering by University Carlos III of Madrid, in 2017.
My passion for new technologies, innovation and continuous improvement lead me to develop my career in software engineering within the transportation and automotive sectors.

Throughout my career, I have honed my skills in software development, specializing in asoftware testing, test automation and product lifecycle management, by applying an industrial engineering approach to ensure quality and compliance in complex and regulated environments.
Thanks to this I have been equiped with a robust skill set and a keen understanding for leveraging technology to driver organizational success.
I am open to connect with professionals who are passionate about innovation, quality and automation.

work.summary: Leading the creation of the testing strategies for the company's product, related with the fleet electric management. Driving the software quality along all the SDLC within an Agile framework, including the automation of the product using tools like Selenium, Cucumber for the front-end testing, as well as using Rest Assured for the API. As time to market was critical, I integrated all these tasks in a shift-left approach, by using CI/CD with Azure DevOps
highlights: By using automation, I reduced the time to market in testing by 25%, as manual efforts were reduced.

work.summary: Built the different testing strategies in the new V&V department, created in the Toll department, by getting, reviewing and refining the different test requirements as well as performing the FAT and SAT tests on field.
highlights: Leading a toll solution implanted in Mexico, in Jalisco

work.summary: Junior Software Engineer in the Enforcement department(Transport sector) at Indra. Responsible of tracing the different requirements as well as developing some tools for the existing internal framework for infringement management.
highlights: Presenting different offers to clients for selling the product.

education.summary: The acquired skills include many technological fields such as mechanics, automatics, electronics, electricity, materials, industrial organization, manufacturing processes or renewable energies. As a result, Industrial Engineers have a multidisciplinary background with a wide-ranging knowledge that allows adapting to the present changing technological scenario. An Industrial Engineer is able to develop a wide range of professional backgrounds such as leadership and project management, consulting, public administration, organization and business management or design of industrial equipment. This demonstrates the flexibility and adaptability of industrial engineers to new labor demands of society.

The Master in Industrial Engineering enables graduates to practice as Industrial Engineers in accordance with current legislation. Industrial Engineers' roles range from product design and product costing, processing, industrial plants and facilities, product research, development and innovation, processing and manufacturing methods, to development, general management and project management in all industries including R&D.
